website_summaries.verdict: A little more expensive than other options, but you’ll get a lot of quality in a large board. Plan on upgrading the accessories fairly quickly.
pros: Despite its size, it is very easy to install
We love how it comes with a lot of accessories to get you started, from markers and erasers to magnets
cons: The plastic covering that this ships with is a pain to remove
The accessories are not of the highest quality

customer_reviews.title: It is a good product. Well packaged
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product. Well packaged. I liked the installing options. The installation is not just for the 4 product corners. It’s movable to where you want your nails to go(especially studs). It’s light weight and portable. I could take the board off easily and put it back on. Cons: 1) As others have mentioned, markers and erasers that come with it are not that good. It’s a freebie to start using right away. Hence, I am not reducing the ratings. Buy EXPO markers and erasers, you will be fine. 2) Instructions are not very clear. But, there is not much to depend on instructions. Overall, I am happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: lak

customer_reviews.title: I feel as though this item was already returned by ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel as though this item was already returned by someone else and sent to me. There is a huge crease in the metal in the back of the board. There is also a sticker on the board that says that there is a protective layer over the board, but it was already removed. I am in a bind here and have to use the board today so returning the item in the original packaging wasn't an option for me. The adjustable marker tray is scratched and the board has some markings.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Kohles

customer_reviews.title: White board 48x36
customer_reviews.text: Highly disappointed. Received a bent whiteboard frame and surface. See picture attached. EDIT: Very satisfied with my new white board. Just in time to practice math problems at home to prepare for my precal final. The board comes with accessories such as markers, erasers and magnetic pins. The screws and screw anchors are also supplied. Highly recommend this seller providing professional communication and customer satisfaction. The seller took the liberty to contact me to fulfill my needs. See picture of new hung whiteboard!
customer_reviews.author: Paull Murillo

customer_reviews.title: Great whiteboard, don't hesitate on buying.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice board from a company that gets it. Comes with multiple mounting fixtures along the top track to accommodate variances in mount points. If you can get two horizontal screws in the wall, you can easily hang this whiteboard. Mine came with 3 sets of screws and drywall anchors, all great quality. I have a few whiteboards at home, and usually find myself having to use my own screws and anchors, but these were good. If I need another whiteboard, definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rich J

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged.  Packaging seemed fine
customer_reviews.text: Board is super nice but came damaged. Packaging was not damage but once I took out the board it had two big bubble like cracks. Sad I have to return it. Hopefully the a new one I’m planning on ordering will come without it being damaged. Update: Got second board and there was no damage. Board holds magnets well and writes and erases with ease. Comparable to my super nice boards I have at work as a school teacher. Very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Great for our homeschooling family!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of the 48" x 36" Dry Erase BoardsSo far we are very happy. They both came very well packaged and were easy to hang on the wall and insert the trays. The hardest part was removing the film that protects the board but we have no complaints, it did its job. The magnets are good quality for what we need and extra erasers are great! One magnet held 8 sheets of notebook paper or 4 sheets of copy paper. We homeschool 4 kids and are looking forward to putting these to use.
customer_reviews.author: Krzy Chic

customer_reviews.title: Good dry erase board
customer_reviews.text: Good dry erase board. Nice quality board and is magnetic. The tray which is to be inserted is a complete failure, it will not go in. I had to use 3M super strong tape which is fine but a pain regardless. Also, the method for hanging it is a pain as well and not as professional as the type that screws directly in the corner and has a cover.
customer_reviews.author: DrSJS

customer_reviews.title: Cracked within a month
customer_reviews.text: Had for a month and there is a crack down the middle of the board? It's attached to my wall and used for a background for teaching online classes. Very disappointing and so huge how do you send it back? P. S. I do love the size.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged but is still functional
customer_reviews.text: Great white board. I use it quite frequently and cleans well with just the eraser. I did receive mine damaged, the metal frame was pinched in one area. Considering it was a big board, I didn't bother with shipping it back. I am still able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: RnB2003

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Magnetic Dry Erase Board
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a perfect magnetic dry-erase board to be the all-in-one spot for notices from school, calendar, shopping list, and kids study and play doodle, and VivReal dry erase board fits the bill perfectly. This board is large enough to handle multiple things going on at once. It comes with all the essential tools you need to start using it, like the markers, erasers, and magnets. Erasers are especially great because they're magnetic, and you can just leave them on the board, saving space where you'd put the markers. I spent a little extra to buy this over other options on Amazon, and it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They survived delivery...
customer_reviews.text: They were a little beat up when they arrived so there were a couple dents and bends, but nothing that I couldn't live with. If you want them pristine, then you better go out and buy them locally. If you're okay with a few dings, then these will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: KevC - Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Total crap. In no way commercial quality. Surface is flexible and it arrived with a pronounced bend across the entire thing.
customer_reviews.author: science_mom

customer_reviews.title: timely inspection
customer_reviews.text: It was a great size, everything came with it. Unfortunately I took it out of the box but not out of the foam protection for several months and there was a nice dent in the upper corner. Too late for me to send back, so my only suggestion is check it once you receive, don't wait in case there is an issue. I gave it 3 stars only because it was damaged but I didn't address timely
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Opened up the box and found it had creases and bumps. I had read a couple of the reviews had mentioned getting defective ones like this but hoped based on the good reviews that I wouldn’t get one. But I did. So I had to return it. Disappointed. Not sure if I should try again? Or go with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Siavash

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price if it lasts. If.
customer_reviews.text: The saying is you get what you pay for. True with white-boards as well. This one is a solid good. as long as it's not moved around I suspect it will do fine. Backing dents very easily. Will see how well the surface lasts. Why do they have to include such cheesy markers and erasers? Went int he trash immediately. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price but not the best
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price, but the black markers included (VivReal brand) left ghost images on the board after cleaning. I switched to Expo markers and no ghost images appeared. The magnetic erasers are nice, so are the magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Ericha J. Kemm

customer_reviews.title: Mounting instructions sketchy
customer_reviews.text: Nice board and fits the space in my home office. Mounting instructions were not very clear and I did not like the triangle hanging hooks, one broke so I used the hidden mounting hardware along with heavy duty velcro. Could not get the marker tray installed, so I am using an Ikea magnetic square cup that works perfectly for the markers and an eraser.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Benton

customer_reviews.title: Great size and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Got this board and hung it on the wall the same day. It came with all the necessary hardware for hanging the board. Only complaint with the installation instructions is the drill bit size needed for the anchors is not provided. I was able to install one anchor no problem but the second one would not set correctly and spun in the hole - I ended up using a set of anchors I had on hand. The quality of the board is great and the size is perfect for me as I section out my boards to track different initiatives for my business.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Meryweather

customer_reviews.title: Great value for home use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to practice business presentations on. I work remotely, so I don’t have easy access to a whiteboard. It appears to be good quality and erases clean. The markers and erasers included were a nice bonus. Only knock is that if you want to hang it without the hooks, using the clips on the back, it won’t sit as securely. I ended up using the hooks on 2 heavy duty drywall anchors. I then used 2-sided adhesive tape to keep the bottom from bouncing against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: P. McCreight

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you need one.
customer_reviews.text: My wife is home schooling our kids.This dry erase board has been a awesome tool for her to use. The board is quality built and comes with everything you need to get started. The packaging is awesome and would take quit a beating for the product to be damage during shipment. Best for price and quality in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: EXP10

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: My children love to write on the dry erase board! I got it as a Christmas gift for them and it’s still a big hit. It’s not like one of those gifts they play with and it’s forgotten about. I love that the board is big and it still looks good. I would definitely rate this a 5 out of 5!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best whiteboard I've seen, well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: The board showed up when promised and was in perfect condition - I was worried about the board getting damage during shipping given how large it is. This board is very solid and I'm able to rest it on my lap and write my ToDo list on it and not worry about it breaking or warping. It wipes clean and there's no ghosting left behind. This board is so much better then the previous one I had - I'd buy this one again if I have a need for a second board, not expecting I'll need to replace this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Fjerstad

customer_reviews.title: Even though my kid is not big enough to draw anything on the board but I believe he will love it because he enjoys watching me draw on the ...
customer_reviews.text: This board is much bigger than I expected (even though it has specs on there I didn't realize until I got it). I bought it for the play room and it fits perfectly. Even though my kid is not big enough to draw anything on the board but I believe he will love it because he enjoys watching me draw on the board:)
customer_reviews.author: Dream

customer_reviews.title: Great white board!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product, it's not perfect, but it's closer to 5 stars than 4. Love the quality, the size, and the fact that its magnetic. I'm glad that I bought it and would recommend. The main areas where I thought it could be better were the instructions and the protective film that covers the whiteboard doesn't come off cleanly... I still have little piece of plastic every where. Minor things...
customer_reviews.author: Joe Prochnow

customer_reviews.title: I love this board
customer_reviews.text: I love this board! It seems to erase well, so far, and I have not had any issues with it. The magnetic option is especially useful when accompanied by the magnetic erasers. I would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Jantec Neon Products

customer_reviews.title: Nice magnetic whiteboard. Beware broken tray attachment
customer_reviews.text: I received this board today. It was easy to install and the board itself was in good condition aside from some minor dents. The magnets work well also. However, the tray attachment was received damaged in the box - this is disappointing because it does not attach to the board and I cannot use the tray to hold the markers, etc.; and even if I could connect it, it’s dented and warped so it wouldn’t look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nick C

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with my new board
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with my new board. I have another of this size but it has bowed in the middle and sticks out from the wall which is annoying. This one has a metal back and won't do that I don't believe. The only thing I don't like is that there are not hangers on the short side to hang it on the wall so that it is tall instead of wide.
customer_reviews.author: rshive34

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, difficult packaging
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality item, however the shrink wrap was difficult to totally remove and some is still stuck between the board and the frame. Seller asked me to leave this review in exchange for a box of markers. I was compensated for this review.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Smile

customer_reviews.title: Decent board, annoying marker tray
customer_reviews.text: The board itself wasn't too hard to put up, very similar to a picture frame, just larger. Only trouble I had was with mounting the marker tray (and actually gave up on it).
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Review update: Customer service replaced damaged board as quickly as they could.
customer_reviews.text: This is an update from previous review. I increased the stars because they sent a replacement white board that arrived undamaged. I didn't give five stars because the other one arrived damaged and I couldn't use it for the program I needed it for - and had to buy another one for that day. So while I'm happy to have the larger board, and hope to use it in the future, it still wasn't a top notch experience.
customer_reviews.author: Robin D Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my home gym to write what workouts my mom needs to do. I was pleasantly surprise by the packaging. Close cell foam and industrial cardboard to protect the board. It came with hardware, 3 eraser, four markers, and 12 magnets. For the money there isn't much that come close to the value and quality of this. My only con is the marker holder is a bit flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: arm618

customer_reviews.title: Great for small to medium sized office
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Bought 5 for a new office we just moved into. They ability to mount them on the included hooks is a big plus, as those might only cost a few cents to add to the product but it makes hanging them an absolute breeze. They also include the drywall anchor hardware. Having the pens, magnets, plus the erasers and the pen/eraser tray to attach to the board included is also a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased! Mint Condition!
customer_reviews.text: My board arrived in mint condition. Great size for my needs. I mainly wanted a magnetic board and the white board was a plus just in case I wanted to write on it. Love my purchase! Shipping time was great. No complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: SamTana

customer_reviews.title: Look no further - this is the board you want
customer_reviews.text: Great white board. Package very well and received without damage. Easy to both write and erase. No ghosting images. The magnetic quality is very good. Sheets of paper do not slide like on our glass white board costing so much more. Highly recommend this product. You will not be disapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice magnetic white-board
customer_reviews.text: Nice magnetic white-board. Easily hung in portrait/vertical position with a little bit of screw removal, relocation of hangers, and rescrewing.
customer_reviews.author: JustAConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Quality control? Replacement works well
customer_reviews.text: First one delaminated immediately, before hanging. Second seems fine... we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Earl

customer_reviews.title: Board dented before shipped
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the box today as we had done a remodel and I was waiting for painting to be finished to put this up. The box appeared completely unharmed and intact therefore I did not open the box upon receipt but now that I opened the package I have found the board is dented and apparently was dented prior to shipping:( Too late to return...lesson learned
customer_reviews.author: Connie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice board!
customer_reviews.text: cleans easily, Durable, easy to mount, Good Value, Quality, Smooth Writing Surface It was easy to mount the two dry-erase boards I bought for a client. She was very happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky  Z

customer_reviews.title: This board is a good size & a good value
customer_reviews.text: This board is a good size & a good value. Didn't really like that it only had mounting "hooks" to hang things from (instead of having holes you could actually drive the screws through). Would have preferred to have the option to have done this, but we made it work. Liked having all of the extra accessories to come with it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic magnetic whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic, large, magnetic white board that was exactly what my daughter wanted. She is thrilled. The first one came with a large crack down the middle (damaged during shipping, we assume), but amazon was great with a quick replacement. Also love that the markers and erasers come with. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole K

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good board — easy to hang and magnetic.
customer_reviews.author: NC Family

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made awful product.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. Came with warps and bends in the board. It isn't even a real white board, its a board covered in some film that acts like a white board. It's awful. If I hadn't torn apart the box in came in I would send it back. Now I am stuck figuring out what to do with and where to hide this horrible thing in our office.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I just received it today, I should say they really packed it well there were about 3 layers of packing material. The dry erase board is top class quality with adjustable hooks and a tray, also light in weight. Every penny worth!
customer_reviews.author: Phantom leap

customer_reviews.title: Great Item for Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This dry erase board is perfect! Great item for great price. It comes with everything you need: markers, erasers, magnets, marker tray. We use it in our business as a project board and it is exactly what we need. 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Layton

customer_reviews.title: can't believe it arrived unharmed
customer_reviews.text: the box was boxed in a larger box - arrived perfect. easy install - just 2 screws in portrait or landscape on pre-installed hangers. the magnetic eraser is great - highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jh illinois

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Mess
customer_reviews.text: Works great but shipped with plastic film all over and cant get it off the trim, learning to live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Del Buono

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived damaged with glue on surface and cannot be removed
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damage and glue all over the surface. As seen in pictures it arrived with a massive dent, there was packing glue all over the whiteboard surface so now when I write in that area, I cannot fully erase the markings. I do not recommend this product at all. Markers last maybe <10 uses.
customer_reviews.author: WaYsTiiD

customer_reviews.title: Great Large Dry Erase Board with markets!
customer_reviews.text: Just received our VIVREAL dry-erase Board ... it’s big enough to write everything and love the 10 magnets.. 4 markers and 3 erasers that came with it! We are thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen G. Buescher

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a large whiteboard!
customer_reviews.text: The board arrived on time without damage! The large size allows our team to mock up design modifications and track complicated orders, along with displaying information we use on a daily basis. We'll be ordering more for each of our offices! It's very nice that it comes with erasers, markers, and magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Dave BM

customer_reviews.title: Love the board
customer_reviews.text: Quality board. The markers that came with it were dry and barely usable. Love the board though
customer_reviews.author: Schlotthauer

customer_reviews.title: ITEM AS DESCRIBED!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Exactly as described and packaged well. Did not come damaged.
customer_reviews.author: TruthBeTold

customer_reviews.title: Good quality marker board for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality marker board for the price. The markers it comes with don't erase very well but if you get some decent markers this board works great.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Professional Quality
customer_reviews.text: The whiteboard is of professional quality and displays any dry erase markings well. The only reason it was not a 5 out of 5 stars is that of the 4 markers that are provided they are all black. It would have been nice to have a couple of different colors other than all black markers. In exchange for this review, VIVReal is also offering a free 12 pack of Expo Dry Erase Markers........all BLACK!
customer_reviews.author: CJ Meurell

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this white board for my room mates and I in preparation for PA school and it is perfect! The size is great, and it is so convenient that this deal comes with magnets, erasers, and markers - makes everything so much easier. We will definitely make good use of this board over the next 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Gregoire

customer_reviews.title: We just got this board installed and is a great tool to organization
customer_reviews.text: We just got this board installed and is a great tool to organization. Markers work great! sometimes board doesn't wipe completely clean not sure why//?
customer_reviews.author: Yippo101

customer_reviews.title: The dry erase board arrived on time and was packed very well.No damage to the corners as other customers posted in their reviews
customer_reviews.text: So far the dry erase board looks great when using the eraser. The magnetic feature is a great place to leave a name tag!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce W.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We recently replaced our office whiteboard with the VIVREAL dry-erase board. What a difference! It erases much cleaner than our old dry-erase board, which really is what a dry-erase is for. Additionally, it is magnetic, which is a major bonus. A great value.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Pijnenburg

customer_reviews.title: Comes with everything you need
customer_reviews.text: Really great product, comes with a few markers, magnetic erasers, and magnet so you don't have to pay extra for those things as individual items. Hanging was easy and included all the parts you needed. The markers it comes with work very well. Only complaint is that it doesn't erase that cleanly sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Buying Another One
customer_reviews.text: Looks as expected...has 3 erasers and many dry erase markers....I will be ordering another one soon as I find enough wall to put it on. Great product and it shipped quickly without damage.
customer_reviews.author: RRR

customer_reviews.title: I loved that it came with markers
customer_reviews.text: This was a little tricky to hang and we had a hard time getting the protective film off, but the board itself is exactly what I expected. I loved that it came with markers, erasers, and magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Its really big, the whiteboard though is very cheap ...
customer_reviews.text: Its really big, the whiteboard though is very cheap, the metal was exposed with a small scratch underneath the white part
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well!
customer_reviews.text: When it showed up, had a little dent on the back, but no big deal. I love the way it writes and even better how it erases, even after you leave something written on it for a while. Magnets work great. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nate C.

customer_reviews.title: Great dry erase board!!
customer_reviews.text: We use this everyday in our office. Nice large size for all our office tracking and comes clean easily, no left over marker residue. Highly recommend! It's also nice that it's magnetic,and comes with different color magnets, to we can code employees. Works just like we wanted it to!!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Ekmanian

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Easy to Install, Perfect for my Home Office.
customer_reviews.text: This dry erase board works wonderfully. The added bonus is the magnetic side which allows me to quickly hang documents on the board when presenting. The board cleans up well and I couldn't be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NTS07

customer_reviews.title: Good quality white board
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these for our office. Fully protected with foam packing inside the box. Easy installation with the included hardware. The magnetic eraser is a nice feature so it's always on the board. The tray was easy to install, and will hold several markers.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the need of instructing or advising with descriptions of the pathophysiology
customer_reviews.author: Advanced Medical - CPRx

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to erase just what you want & not ...
customer_reviews.text: Using my new Dry Erase board for a Planning project to keep all of the group ideas fresh on everyone's minds. Allows for quick changes and project management. Super easy to erase just what you want & not leave traces.... Perfect, just Love it....
customer_reviews.author: CV_LLP Tech Support

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with the size of the whiteboard
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the size of the whiteboard, but the quality isn't that great. It arrived a little banged up, too, but It is still usable. The included hardware was a little cheap, so I used my own for installation.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlynn Strong

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got exactly what I expected. Surface dry wipes clean. Doesn't stain.
customer_reviews.author: J Cot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our homeschool classroom
customer_reviews.text: This white board is perfect for our homeschool classroom. It was easy to hang and has plenty of room for all of our instruction and board work. I also love that it is magnetic - super helpful!
customer_reviews.author: kemmbee

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as expected , the shipping box was okay but the board itself had a huge dent running through the entire width right through the middle. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: ppvv

customer_reviews.title: Decent piece, as long as it arrives undamaged
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a church Sunday School room. Unit arrived damaged from being dropped on a corner but didn't have time to wait so I bent it back out the best I could. Unit could benefit from additional mounting hardware at the bottom to keep board secure to wall.
customer_reviews.author: Demetri

customer_reviews.title: careful with the protective film
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality but protective film did not come off very easily. It stuck in the frame. Other than that, very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L. Fourman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size! Looks great in my new office
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size! Looks great in my new office. Item was packaged well and all parts/items accounted for! Great purchase at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy W.

customer_reviews.title: The board arrived warped in two places. The tray ...
customer_reviews.text: The board arrived warped in two places. The tray is very flimsy. I don't trust Amazon stars anymore - many times I see such high reviews and end up confused.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Chiantia

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Everything came well-packed. Instructions are clear. Feels not too heavy, yet well-made and strong. It also came with nice accessories like dry erase erasers, markers and colorful magnets. I think it was the right choice for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: Our company uses the board to keep track of our ...
customer_reviews.text: Our company uses the board to keep track of our equipment, trailers and vehicles as to location and employee responsibility. It has proven to be dependable and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: John Kellett

customer_reviews.title: Item was delivered on time and in excellent condition! It was very easy to install on ...
customer_reviews.text: Item was delivered on time and in excellent condition! It was very easy to install on the wall, and I use it for my “10” grandchildren to draw on and I also purchased magnetic letters & numbers to use it as a learning time!
customer_reviews.author: edvardo medrano

customer_reviews.title: This board makes a great addition to my office
customer_reviews.text: This board makes a great addition to my office. Writes smooth and wipes off clean. The only negative is the marker tray is a bit flimsy but I don't really use it much so it's really a non issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Belinski

customer_reviews.title: Great combo pack with everything we needed to be productive ...
customer_reviews.text: Great combo pack with everything we needed to be productive in the office. Haven't hung it yet but the surface is great and accessories worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: John K. Lunde

customer_reviews.title: Perfect white board for your office or room. Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what my son was looking for to put up in his room. Great quality. Works great. Love that it came with the magic markers and erasers. Both were of good quality and work well.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Forrester

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for the wonderful board. It was packed securely so when it ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for the wonderful board. It was packed securely so when it arrived everything was in tack. I look forward to using this product and using you all again in the future. Thanks! Sierra
customer_reviews.author: angel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for office
customer_reviews.text: The board is a great size for our office and having meetings. It is large enough to have the information we need, yet doesn't take up an entire wall. The only drawback is the erasers leave smudges. Other than that it is great.
